visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=901 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=901 RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Bugs as Bugs,n.Vulnerablilities as Vulnerablilities,n.CodeSmell as CodeSmell ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=901 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=901 RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Bugs as Bugs,n.Vulnerablilities as Vulnerablilities,n.CodeSmell as CodeSmell ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=901 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=901 RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Bugs as Bugs,n.Vulnerablilities as Vulnerablilities,n.CodeSmell as CodeSmell ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=900 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=900 RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date, n.Productivity as Productivity ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=902 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=902 RETURN   apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=902 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=902 RETURN   apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=902 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=902 RETURN   apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 900 and n.kpiId=903 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=903 and n.StoryTypes in ['PaymentServices','MobileServices','ClaimFinder','AgentLocator'] with n return distinct n.StoryTypes as StoryTypes ,toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.Duration))) as Duration
